queries.query: INSERT INTO `api_accesslogs` (`vIPAddress`, `vAPIName`, `vAPIURL`, `dAccessDate`, `vPlatform`, `vBrowser`, `vFileName`) VALUES ('103.47.153.165', 'connections', 'http://18.211.58.235/canoodle/WS/connections', '2020-11-18 14:12:19', 'Unknown OS Platform', 'Unknown Browser', 'connections-1605708739.json')

SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iConnectionUserId` IN('13') AND `iUserId` IN('12')

SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iUserId` IN('13') AND `iConnectionUserId` IN('12')
SELECT `u`.`eIsSubscribed` AS `u_is_subscribed`,`u`.`iLikesPerDay` AS `u_likes_per_day`,`u`.`iUserId` AS `u_users_id_1` FROM `users` AS `u` WHERE `u`.`iUserId` = '12'  LIMIT 1

SELECT `s`.`iUserId` AS `s_users_id`,`r`.`iUserId` AS `r_users_id`,`r`.`vDeviceToken` AS `r_device_token`,`r`.`eIsSubscribed` AS `r_premium_status`,CONCAT(s.vFirstName," ",s.vLastName) AS s_name FROM `user_connections` AS `uc` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `s` ON `uc`.`iUserId` = `s`.`iUserId` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `r` ON `uc`.`iConnectionUserId`  = `r`.`iUserId` WHERE (uc.iUserId = 12 AND uc.iConnectionUserId = 13)  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `notification` (`vNotificationMessage`, `iNotifierId`, `eNotificationType`, `dtAddedAt`, `dtUpdatedAt`, `eNotificationStatus`, `iUserId`) VALUES ('Gayatri Patole wants to canoodle with you', '13', 'Like', NOW(), NOW(), 'Active', '12')
SELECT `ui`.`vProfileImage` AS `ui_image`,`ui`.`iUserId` AS `ui_users_id` FROM `users` AS `ui` WHERE `ui`.`iUserId` = '12'  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `mod_push_notifications` (`vUniqueId`, `vDeviceId`, `eMode`, `eNotifyCode`, `vSound`, `vBadge`, `vTitle`, `tMessage`, `tVarsJSON`, `eDeviceType`, `dtAddDateTime`, `tSendJSON`, `dtExeDateTime`, `eStatus`) VALUES ('ac569', 'DCF08894E38E48ABC0A41CE8268ADDEB98DB66E35E6AE073EF7E24CCD083249A', 'live', 'USER', '', 0, '', 'Gayatri Patole wants to canoodle with you', '[{\"key\":\"type\",\"value\":\"Like\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"receiver_id\",\"value\":\"13\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_id\",\"value\":\"12\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_name\",\"value\":\"Gayatri Patole\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_profile\",\"value\":null,\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_image\",\"value\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\",\"send\":\"Yes\"}]', 'iOS', '2020-11-18 14:12:19', '{\"aps\":{\"badge\":0,\"sound\":\"received.caf\",\"alert\":{\"body\":\"Gayatri Patole wants to canoodle with you\"}},\"code\":\"USER\",\"id\":\"ac569\",\"type\":\"Like\",\"receiver_id\":\"13\",\"user_id\":\"12\",\"user_name\":\"Gayatri Patole\",\"user_profile\":\"\",\"user_image\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\"}', '2020-11-18 14:12:19', 'Executed')
